rules_text:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this land.
{BG}, {T}: Add {B}{G}.
{1}{B}{G}: This land becomes a 0/0 black and green Plant Zombie land creature until end of turn. [i](It's still a land.)[/i]
notes:
ARTed

Note that we have a lot of BG lands
[7:58 PM]pat [in the layers jar]: This isn't necessarily a problem, just something to keep in mind when we get to lands and potential cycles
